amendment.description: Amendment inserts an additional study to the bill of merit provisions that would examine whether or not high-frequency trading increases market volatility.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 1 printed in House Report 113-476 to add one requirement to the study on high frequency trading: Whether such trading increases market volatility, including short term market swings such as the "flash crash.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. DeFazio.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
